bibl.title: The Ptolemies, the Sea and the Nile. Studies in Waterborne Power.
bibl.note: Third International Ptolemaic Colloquium, held in the Peiraeus 18-20 September 2009. - Pp. xiii-xiv: Preface; - xix-xxi: Christian Habicht, In memoriam F.W. Walbank; - 1-18, 1 carte: D.J.Th. & K.B., Introduction; - 259-274: Index. - 14 communications.
bibl.seg: Kostas Buraselis, Mary Stefanou & Dorothy J. Thompson (edd.), The Ptolemies, the Sea and the Nile. Studies in Waterborne Power.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2013, 8°, xxii-274 pp., 5 cartes, 19 figg., 8 tabl. ISBN 978-1-107-03335-1. £60.

Third International Ptolemaic Colloquium, held in the Peiraeus 18-20 September 2009. - Pp. xiii-xiv: Preface; - xix-xxi: Christian Habicht, In memoriam F.W. Walbank; - 1-18, 1 carte: D.J.Th. & K.B., Introduction; - 259-274: Index. - 14 communications.
C.R. par Ian S. Moyer, BASP 52 (2015) pp. 363-368. - Nicholas K. Rauh, JHS 135 (2015) pp. 241-242. - Stefan Pfeiffer, Gymnasium 123 (2016) pp. 97-99.
